Sanitas Skincare Topical C

Brand: Sanitas

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Ascorbyl Palmitate (Vitamin C), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Chole-calciferol (Vitamin D), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
